About me

Last of the freelance hackers.
Greatest sword fighter in the world.
Stringer, Central Intelligence Corporation.
Specializing in software-related intel (music, movies & microcode)

~ Snow Crash

Adam Wong a full-stack developer living in beautiful Portland Oregon. His hobbies include linux, motorcyling and Star Trek.
